summary: This is an email chain from July 11, 2019, regarding the provision of a transcript from the Konstantin Ignatova bail hearing to the Epstein legal team, as requested. It involves communication between a U.S. Attorney's Office official and others.

persons.name: Konstantin Ignatova
persons.context: The document mentions that a transcript of his bail hearing was obtained and provided to the Epstein team.

events.title: Email regarding Ignatova transcript
events.description: An email is sent confirming that the transcript for Konstantin Ignatova's bail hearing was obtained and provided to the Epstein team as requested.

keyFacts: A transcript from Konstantin Ignatova's bail hearing was obtained and provided to the Epstein legal team.
The communication occurred via email on July 11, 2019.
The request for the transcript was made by an unspecified party (redacted).
The email involves a Co-Chief of the Complex Frauds and Cybercrime Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
